name: test-be-project
description: Full-stack application with client, server, and worker services

scripts.dev: npm run build:packages && concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:worker" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared-types && npm run build --workspace=packages/shared-utils
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:server && npm run build:worker && npm run build:client
scripts.start: npm run build:packages && concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:worker" "npm run start:client"
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && rm -rf apps/client/.next apps/server/dist apps/worker/dist packages/*/dist
